attributes.review: After downloading this app, I noticed that the size of my hands starting slowly decreasing. Eventually it became impossible to drink water without using both hands. It became difficult to tweet resulting in many of my messages  being incomprehensible. I finally had to stop use and seek medical help. After having to pay out of pocket for thousands of dollars worth of medical bills, I was diagnosed with itty bitty trump hand syndrome. Eventually it will spread to my brain, and I will become a Cheeto. Please do not download.
attributes.title: This app cost me thousands of dollars

attributes.review:
The app doesn't seem to function as advertised. Faulty menus and confusing navigation. I was hoping to use this app as a resource to be informed for November but it just causes more headache than convenience :( Also, after an eternity of installation time the opening page greets you with a rather unflattering shot of our president. Whoever approved the use of that photo should revise because I don't think it conveys the strength, and capability this relentless campaign usually strives to parody.  

Would love to see improvement.
attributes.title: Not helpful. Very problematic
